javascript:!function(){var e={};e.copyToClipboard=void 0,e.copyToClipboard=function(t,e,o){var n,i;o&&(n=o.body,(i=o.createElement("button")).setAttribute("style",["position: fixed","top: 0px","left: 0px","z-index: 99999","background: lightgreen","border: 2px solid black","border: color: black","letter-spacing: normal","word-spacing: normal","text-transform: none","text-indent: 0px","text-shadow: none","display: inline-block","text-align: center","cursor: default","box-sizing: border-box","margin: 0em","font: 400 20pt Arial"].join(";")),i.textContent=e,n.appendChild(i),i.onclick=function(){var e;(e=o.createElement("textarea")).setAttribute("style","width: 0px; height:0px"),n.appendChild(e),e.value=t,setTimeout(function(){e.select(),e.setSelectionRange(0,99999),o.execCommand("copy"),n.removeChild(e)},1),n.removeChild(i)})};var t=document.title.replace(/[\|\[\(\]\)]/g," "),o=document.location.href,n=new Date,i=n.getTimezoneOffset(),r=(n=new Date(n.getTime()-60*i*1e3)).toISOString().split("T")[0];e.copyToClipboard("- "+r+" ["+t+"]("+o+")","Copy Page URL to Clipboard",document)}();
